official_title: To amend the Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Act of 1990 to authorize additional appropriations for the Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Program Trust Fund, and for other purposes.
short_title: Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Program Trust Fund Enhancement Act of 2005

summary.text: Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Program Trust Fund Enhancement Act of 2005 - Authorizes additional appropriations for the Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Program Trust Fund.

titles.title: Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Program Trust Fund Enhancement Act of 2005
To amend the Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Act of 1990 to authorize additional appropriations for the Eisenhower Exchange Fellowship Program Trust Fund, and for other purposes.
